'''"Conversation of the Forbidden Fortress"''' is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for "Conversation of the Forbidden Fortress" is obtainable from a [[Remarkable Chest]] in [[Fontaine]].

==How to Obtain==
Obtained from a Remarkable Chest at a [[Fatui Skirmisher]] camp after solving a [[Pneumousia Block]] puzzle.
